description.en: Superpower Squad is a blockchain technology-based third-person-shooter game consists of gameplays such as MOBA, RPG, and Roguelike. The game supports solo and team modes, with immersive gaming experience, diverse game mode, and delicate hero & skin & weapon synthesis and upgrade system. Superpower Squad is going to bring eSports culture to web3 for all players. The mobile app has integrated a native in-app wallet to lower down the learning cost of web2 gamers. With innovative gaming model and user-friendly blockchain infrastructure, Superpower Squad will lead the eSports in web3 industry.
